def_en: A pine tree or a pine is a tall tree which has very thin, sharp leaves and a fresh smell. Pine trees have leaves all year round.

def_cn: （因死亡或离别而）怀念，苦苦思念，为…难过
def_en: If you pine for someone who has died or gone away, you want them to be with you very much and feel sad because they are not there.

def_cn: 渴望，苦苦盼望（尤指不大可能拥有的东西）
def_en: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it.
